posts._title: Masao Adachi – Ryakusho: renzoku shasatsuma AKA Serial Killer (1969)
posts.title: Ryakusho: renzoku shasatsuma
posts.excerpt: Midnight Eye wrote: A horrifying series of murders, committed by a teenaged killer in 1968, prompted a group of filmmakers to chart his path, capturing the things he might have seen before committing his crimes. Their result is this provocative, rarely-screened meditation on geography and society.
